column8: 2015 at owensboro place care & rehab center. he was born march 17
column10: in to the late edwin c and jessie m. connor bosaw. he was a member of st. stephen cathedral. aside from his parents he is predeceased by five sisters and four brothers. surviving are three stepdaughters
column11: one stepson and one niece. there will be no visitation or services. haley-mc. ginnis & owensboro funeral home has been entrusted with the care of mr. bosaw. condolences for the family of donald gordly bosaw may be left at www. haleymcginnis. com.
